front.title: Policy Framework QoS Information Model for MPLS

abstract.t: This document presents an information model for representing QoSpolicies for Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS). The model isbased on the Policy Framework QoS Information Model (QPIM) and thePolicy Core Information Model (PCIM). These models are extended withnew classes for controlling and managing the life-cycle of LabelSwitched Paths (LSPs) and for mapping of traffic onto existing LSPs.The control and management of LSP life-cycles includes mainly thecreation, update, and deletion of LSPs and the assignment of QoSproperties to LSPs.Even if this document is primarily intended to cover the QoS relatedMPLS areas, it also covers traffic engineering related policies.
